  • Constructor Details

    • Plant

      public Plant(int cost, float regenerateRate, int damage, int health, int range, int directDamage, float speed, Tile position)
      Constructs a plant with all given attributes
      Parameters:
      cost - Amount of sun needed to use the plant
      regenerateRate - Amount of time the plant needs to regenerate
      damage - Amount of damage the plant does to the zombie
      health - Amount of damage the plant can sustain
      range - How far the attack of the plant can reach
      directDamage - Amount of damage the plant does to zombies at a closer range
      speed - How fast the next attack will be
      position - The position of the plant

  • Method Details

    • action

      public int action(Zombie zombie)
      Attacks the specified zombie if it is on the same row and within range.
      Parameters:
      zombie - target zombie
      Returns:
      remaining health of the zombie after the attack

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(Zombie zombie)
      Applies damage from the given zombie to this plant.
      Parameters:
      zombie - attacking zombie

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns:
      Boolean based on Plant health

    • getHealth

      public float getHealth()
      Returns:
      The current health of the plant

    • getDamage

      public float getDamage()
      Returns:
      The damage the plant deals

    • getDirectDamage

      public float getDirectDamage()
      Returns:
      The damage plant deals at a closer range

    • getRange

      public float getRange()
      Returns:
      The range of the plant's attack

    • getSpeed

      public float getSpeed()
      Returns:
      The speed of the plant's next attack

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns:
      How much the plant costs to place

    • getRegenerateRate

      public float getRegenerateRate()
      Returns:
      How fast plants can be generated

      public Tile getPosition()

      public void setGameEventListener(GameEventListener l)
